text.text: Stayed at the Novotel Hotel which was just opposite of the mall and thus spent lots of time hanging around. I must say that this is one of my favourite malls as there's just everything that you might need from supermarkets, electronics, sport outlets, very interesting restaurants and fast food chains like McDonalds & KFC. It's quite practical for many foreigners as there's also lots of ATM Cash Machines and Currency Exchange facilities on the lower floors.

It's quite practical for many foreigners as there's also lots of ATM Cash Machines and Currency Exchange facilities on the lower floors.

text.text:
City Square Mall has seen some recent renovations, giving the place a refreshed look while keeping it just as convenient and accessible. The updates include modernized interiors, improved lighting, and upgraded seating areas, making the shopping experience more pleasant.

The retail mix remains strong, with stores ranging from fashion and lifestyle to electronics and home essentials. The dining options continue to impress, with plenty of choices for both quick bites and sit-down meals. The food court has also been revamped, with better seating arrangements and a cleaner, more organized layout.

For those who enjoy shopping for sports gear, Decathlon is still a highlight, while FairPrice remains a convenient spot for groceries. The Golden Village cinema is a good option for moviegoers, now enhanced with better facilities.

The renovations have definitely improved the overall ambiance, making City Square Mall a solid shopping and dining destination with a fresher, more modern feel.

text.text:
Updated Review: Mar 2025
The Mall is finally near completion for the revamp works. Most of the construction is completed. It is great to see the cinema, airzone opened again alongside with other new stores. I dont really like the curvy void though. The toilets should be upgraded next.

The family friendly mall is now back again.
Would love to visit more often.

Previous Review:
Used to love coming here because they have lots of anchors that are family friendly. The last 2 years have been tough as they went for major revamp. Disappointed the popular has shrunk so much. Some interesting tenants but still not the same as before.

text.text: Ongoing exhibition - unique and eco-friendly experience just outside City Square Mall! The CDL EcoTrain offers an interactive and educational journey on sustainability. The train is beautifully designed, with engaging exhibits on renewable energy and conservation. It's a fun and informative stop for anyone interested in environmental awareness.

The train is beautifully designed, with engaging exhibits on renewable energy and conservation. It's a fun and informative stop for anyone interested in environmental awareness.

text.text: Great foods! A lot of shops and also a lot of construction going on during my visit which blocks off parts of the mall. They have narrow walkways and broken escalators.
